t: Bless{H1288}{(H8761)} the LORD{H3068}, O my soul{H5315}. O LORD{H3068} my God{H430}, thou art very{H3966} great{H1431}{(H8804)}; thou art clothed{H3847}{(H8804)} with honour{H1935} and majesty{H1926}.
Who coverest{H5844}{(H8802)} thyself with light{H216} as with a garment{H8008}: who stretchest out{H5186}{(H8802)} the heavens{H8064} like a curtain{H3407}:

Who layeth the beams{H7136}{(H8764)} of his chambers{H5944} in the waters{H4325}: who maketh{H7760}{(H8802)} the clouds{H5645} his chariot{H7398}: who walketh{H1980}{(H8764)} upon the wings{H3671} of the wind{H7307}:
Who maketh{H6213}{(H8802)} his angels{H4397} spirits{H7307}; his ministers{H8334}{(H8764)} a flaming{H3857}{(H8802)} fire{H784}:
Who laid{H3245}{(H8804)} the foundations{H4349} of the earth{H776}, that it should not be removed{H4131}{(H8735)} for ever{H5769}{H5703}.
Thou coveredst{H3680}{(H8765)} it with the deep{H8415} as with a garment{H3830}: the waters{H4325} stood{H5975}{(H8799)} above the mountains{H2022}.
At{H4480} thy rebuke{H1606} they fled{H5127}{(H8799)}; at the voice{H6963} of thy thunder{H7482} they hasted{H2648}{(H8735)} away.
They go up{H5927}{(H8799)} by the mountains{H2022}; they go down{H3381}{(H8799)} by the valleys{H1237} unto the place{H4725} which{H2088} thou hast founded{H3245}{(H8804)} for them.
Thou hast set{H7760}{(H8804)} a bound{H1366} that they may not pass over{H5674}{(H8799)}; that they turn not again{H7725}{(H8799)} to cover{H3680}{(H8763)} the earth{H776}.
He sendeth{H7971}{(H8764)} the springs{H4599} into the valleys{H5158}, which run{H1980}{(H8762)} among the hills{H2022}.
They give drink{H8248}{(H8686)} to every beast{H2416} of the field{H7704}: the wild asses{H6501} quench{H7665}{(H8799)} their thirst{H6772}.
By them shall the fowls{H5775} of the heaven{H8064} have their habitation{H7931}{(H8799)}, which sing{H5414}{(H8799)}{H6963} among{H996} the branches{H6073}.
He watereth{H8248}{(H8688)} the hills{H2022} from his chambers{H5944}: the earth{H776} is satisfied{H7646}{(H8799)} with the fruit{H6529} of thy works{H4639}.

He causeth the grass{H2682} to grow{H6779}{(H8688)} for the cattle{H929}, and herb{H6212} for the service{H5656} of man{H120}: that he may bring forth{H3318}{(H8687)} food{H3899} out of the earth{H776};

And wine{H3196} that maketh glad{H8055}{(H8762)} the heart{H3824} of man{H582}, and oil{H8081} to make his face{H6440} to shine{H6670}{(H8687)}, and bread{H3899} which strengtheneth{H5582}{(H8799)} man's{H582} heart{H3824}.
The trees{H6086} of the LORD{H3068} are full{H7646}{(H8799)} of sap; the cedars{H730} of Lebanon{H3844}, which he hath planted{H5193}{(H8804)};
Where the birds{H6833} make their nests{H7077}{(H8762)}: as for the stork{H2624}, the fir trees{H1265} are her house{H1004}.
The high{H1364} hills{H2022} are a refuge{H4268} for the wild goats{H3277}; and the rocks{H5553} for the conies{H8227}.
He appointed{H6213}{(H8804)} the moon{H3394} for seasons{H4150}: the sun{H8121} knoweth{H3045}{(H8804)} his going down{H3996}.
Thou makest{H7896}{(H8799)} darkness{H2822}, and it is night{H3915}: wherein all the beasts{H2416} of the forest{H3293} do creep{H7430}{(H8799)} forth.
The young lions{H3715} roar{H7580}{(H8802)} after their prey{H2964}, and seek{H1245}{(H8763)} their meat{H400} from God{H410}.
The sun{H8121} ariseth{H2224}{(H8799)}, they gather themselves together{H622}{(H8735)}, and lay them down{H7257}{(H8799)} in their dens{H4585}.
Man{H120} goeth forth{H3318}{(H8799)} unto his work{H6467} and to his labour{H5656} until the evening{H6153}.
O LORD{H3068}, how manifold{H7231}{(H8804)} are thy works{H4639}! in wisdom{H2451} hast thou made{H6213}{(H8804)} them all: the earth{H776} is full{H4390}{(H8804)} of thy riches{H7075}.
So is this great{H1419} and wide{H7342}{H3027} sea{H3220}, wherein are things creeping{H7431} innumerable{H4557}, both small{H6996} and great{H1419} beasts{H2416}.
There go{H1980}{(H8762)} the ships{H591}: there is that leviathan{H3882}, whom thou hast made{H3335}{(H8804)} to play{H7832}{(H8763)} therein.
These wait{H7663}{(H8762)} all upon thee; that thou mayest give{H5414}{(H8800)} them their meat{H400} in due season{H6256}.
That thou givest{H5414}{(H8799)} them they gather{H3950}{(H8799)}: thou openest{H6605}{(H8799)} thine hand{H3027}, they are filled{H7646}{(H8799)} with good{H2896}.

Thou hidest{H5641}{(H8686)} thy face{H6440}, they are troubled{H926}{(H8735)}: thou takest away{H622}{(H8799)} their breath{H7307}, they die{H1478}{(H8799)}, and return{H7725}{(H8799)} to their dust{H6083}.
Thou sendest{H7971}{(H8762)} forth thy spirit{H7307}, they are created{H1254}{(H8735)}: and thou renewest{H2318}{(H8762)} the face{H6440} of the earth{H127}.
The glory{H3519} of the LORD{H3068} shall endure for ever{H5769}: the LORD{H3068} shall rejoice{H8055}{(H8799)} in his works{H4639}.
He looketh{H5027}{(H8688)} on the earth{H776}, and it trembleth{H7460}{(H8799)}: he toucheth{H5060}{(H8799)} the hills{H2022}, and they smoke{H6225}{(H8799)}.
I will sing{H7891}{(H8799)} unto the LORD{H3068} as long as I live{H2416}: I will sing{H2167}{(H8762)} praise to my God{H430} while I have my being{H5750}.
My meditation{H7879} of him shall be sweet{H6149}{(H8799)}: I will be glad{H8055}{(H8799)} in the LORD{H3068}.

Let the sinners{H2400} be consumed{H8552}{(H8735)} out of the earth{H776}, and let the wicked{H7563} be no more. Bless{H1288}{(H8761)} thou the LORD{H3068}, O my soul{H5315}. Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} ye the LORD{H3050}.
